__e: Tommy, you know the difference between telling the truth and lying?
You refuse to do what I ask, and do you know the most important reason?
But you know what the difference between you and me is?
How do you know my mother's name?
And do you know that young man's name?
Haven't you ever heard, "go after the second prettiest to get the prettiest's attention"?
How do you know that song?
I mean, would it have killed you to have acted professionally today?
Since you're so great at noticing untapped potential, how do you know this person again?
And how... do you know my name?
Who are you, and how do you know my name?
How do you know my and my mother's name?
Well, the thing I can't figure out is, how did you know my prescription?
Who are you, and how do you know my name?
How do you know my and my mother's name?
How'd you know it was taken?
Why are you touching my waist?
Give me yes or no. Do you know the guy? And when do I meet you to talk about it?
Did you ever know a guy who had seen an angel?
Have you ever known a place where God would have felt at home?
Have you ever known a place where God would have felt at home?
